snippet: The struggles of the Mets’ Ike Davis continued, as he doubled home a tying run against the Yankees but was tagged out at third one play later in a nonforce situation.
abstract: New York Mets first baseman Ike Davis finally shows a sign of promise with an RBI double in the ninth inning against the New York Yankees.
lead_paragraph: The struggles of the Mets’ Ike Davis continued, as he doubled home a tying run against the Yankees but was tagged out at third one play later in a nonforce situation.

headline.seo: Ike Davis of Mets Has Good and Bad 9th Inning Against Yanks
headline.main: Davis Gets Big Hit in 9th Before Bad Luck Returns
headline.print_headline: Davis Gets Big Hit in 9th Before Bad Luck Returns
